string.text: Error - no suitable config string for batteries detected. Write a bugreport to Moddb Fatal Error comment section
shows location of nearby squads from your faction
shows location of nearby neutral squads
shows location of all nearby squads.
show location of only enemies squads nearby
Error - no suitable config string for squads detected. Write a bugreport to Moddb Fatal Error comment section
make beep-sound if there are stalker in 50 meters radius
There is no battery in the device

If you're reading this, it means your Modded Exes are outdated and not compatible with the Fatal Error addon. Fatal Error now requires Modded Exes from August 23, 2025 (2025.8.23) or later. If you use AOEngine ask v2v3v4 to update it to latest Modded Exes version.

If you're reading this, it means you installed Fatal Error addon wrong. Fatal Error should overwrite EVERYTHING (even your (and my) beloved Beef's NVGs), especially item_device.script. So, change your MO2 load order, and try launching the game once again.
Fatal Error Addon has detected an issue and prevented a game crash. The game can continue running.

An error marker has been placed. This specific error will not reappear in your current playthrough. Please report this issue in the Fatal Error Addon topics on either the Anomaly or G.A.M.M.A. Discord servers. Remember to include your log file with the report.
